attributes.action: To speak with the Gambling Commision to ask them if they could this once honour this competition to commence!!  and for future competitions they make it clear in their rules and regulations what constitutes as a competion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is for the PM to speak to the Gambling Commision and ask them to honour the competition ( WIN A DEVON PROPERTY WITH FISHING ) to go a head and also ask the GM to make their rules and regulations clear for future competitions such alike

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
